summary: The 'Funding Officers and Resources To Increase Facility Youth Protection Act' (FORTIFY Act) seeks to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968.  It primarily focuses on school security by authorizing the use of matching grant program funds for hiring school resource officers (SROs), purchasing firearms/equipment for them, and buying vehicles for SROs. The bill also mandates technical assistance to improve grant access for rural/underserved areas and requires a report to Congress on this assistance.
